completeWithdrawAccount(uint256).details: User must have previously called `requestWithdrawAccount()` and waited for the cooldown to elapse.

completeWithdrawAccount(uint256).notice: Allows a user to complete their exit from the Matching system. Can be called by anyone on withdrawable accounts.

depositSubAccount(uint256).notice: Allows user to open an account by transferring their account NFT to this contract.

depositSubAccountFor(uint256,address).notice: Allows user to open an account for any address by transferring their own account NFT to this contract.

requestWithdrawAccount(uint256).notice: Activates the cooldown period to withdraw account.
